name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
With 8 years of experience, I am a Full Stack Developer who successfully integrates robust security practices into high-performance solutions suitable for enterprise environments. I have a strong background in **Desktop Virtualization**, **Mobile Device Management**, and **Identity Access Management**, which are critical for the role of a Senior EUC Engineer. My expertise includes building applications with **React**, **Node.js**, and **Python**, while also leveraging cloud platforms like **Azure** and **AWS** for seamless deployment and scalability. I possess hands-on experience in **Enterprise Security**, implementing strategies like the **Zero-Trust security model** and **Endpoint Protection** methodologies.

I have led the development of enterprise-grade applications that prioritize customer adoption, and I'm proficient in translating complex technical concepts for various audiences through strong **presentation** and **interpersonal skills**. Additionally, I excel in **time management**, ensuring that project timelines align with compliance standards and customer expectations. My approach combines technical acumen with a focus on client needs, aiming to enhance user experience across **SaaS Services** and enterprise architectures.
